thread.section_title: Ties.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ties.com | www.ties.com
thread.title: Lauren Wall

author: Lauren Wall
title: Lauren Wall
text: I ordered ties for my fiance and his groomsmen for our wedding in May. I was having trouble finding something that matched my bridesmaids' dresses, and then I found Ties.Com! Not only were they affordable, but I was SO happy when the ties arrived! They were high quality and the color was perfect, just as it looked on the website! Can't recommend them enough! They even took care in how they packaged them. I will definitely be a repeat customer!
